name: Haunted Mansion (itch) (Armed Gorilla, Bruno Marques - Music & Sound Design, Amin Montazeri)
name_original: Haunted Mansion (itch) (Armed Gorilla, Bruno Marques - Music & Sound Design, Amin Montazeri)
description:
This game was created during one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

  • 3D Models & Textures by Rotten
  • Level Design by Amin Montazeri
  • Music & SFX by Dani Stob, Bruno Marques and Lilla
  • Code by Saeed Prez
